title: Recieving an Inactivity Notification Even Though I Play Daily
body:
So for the past 2 days I have been recieving notifications about getting demoted in "x" amount of days. I play ranked nearly every day and have for months now. I usually even play more than once a day, up to many times. I'm afraid there is a bug and I might get demoted for no reason. Please look into my account.

{{champion:103}} is bae

replies.body: Same problem at Euw at the moment for me

Hello i have the same Problem on my Account DEM BARRELZ i played alot of Ranked Games in the last time and yet the Message comes along when im logging into my Account pls help.  im from EUW sry if its the wrong comment Section

I looked over your match history to be sure that the ranked games are all being captured by our system. No worries there! I can clearly see that you've been playing multiple ranked matches almost every day. I reached out to some people, and it seems like we had some faulty demote messages sent out. 

Don't worry, as long as you keep playing those ranked games you won't get demoted for "not playing"!
